entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 7.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
